Title: Provides for giving of just compensation upon the taking of any billboard
Summary: Provides for giving of just compensation upon the taking of any billboard in accordance with the eminent domain procedure law; removes amortization schedules for the removal of billboards in areas other than industrial and manufacturing zones.
LawCode: Amd ยง74-c, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to taking of billboards
